steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction start --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction add ghs.googlehosted.com. --name=${_ACTION}.${_DOMAIN}.${_SERVICE}.staging.sustainer.network --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --type=CNAME --ttl=300 --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction execute --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction abort --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta run domain-mappings create --platform=managed --service=staging-${_SERVICE}-${_DOMAIN}-${_ACTION}-${_TYPE} --domain=${_ACTION}.${_DOMAIN}.${_SERVICE}.staging.sustainer.network --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} --region=${_GCP_REGION} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: sed -e 's/#_NAME/staging-${_SERVICE}-${_DOMAIN}-${_ACTION}-${_TYPE}/g; s/#_HOST/${_ACTION}.${_DOMAIN}.${_SERVICE}.staging.sustainer.network/g; s/#_GCP_PROJECT/${_GCP_PROJECT}/g; s/#_GCP_REGION/${_GCP_REGION}/g; s/#_TITLE/Staging ${_TITLE}/g' doc.json > doc.staging.json
